refnamediv.refpurpose: Overview of all configured BSR resources

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: bsr-overview offers an overview of the state of all configured BSR resources. It provides information about the connection status of each BSR resource. It will also use auxiliary information provided by df1, lvm8, xm1 and virsh1 for BSR resources used as mounted filesystems, LVM physical volumes, Xen domain backing disks and libvirt instance disks respectively.
